h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Maitreya's Orb Location
content: The Maitreya's Orb can be found in the Valley of Ecstasy in The New West, specifically at the Mindfullness Cliff Shrine. From the Shrine, head up the long staircase ahead and continue along until you reach the room with the lit torches. Sitting in the box you can find the orb.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Maitreya's_Orb.md', within the main section titled 'Maitreya's Orb', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Maitreya's Orb Location'.
The content is as follows:
The Maitreya's Orb can be found in the Valley of Ecstasy in The New West, specifically at the Mindfullness Cliff Shrine. From the Shrine, head up the long staircase ahead and continue along until you reach the room with the lit torches. Sitting in the box you can find the orb.
